name: ServiceException
documentation:
Exception thrown when a {@link io.fluxzero.common.api.Request} fails and an {@link ErrorResult} is returned by the Fluxzero Runtime.

This exception is used to complete the {@link CompletableFuture} of a failed request with the message from the associated {@code ErrorResult}.

constructors.name: ServiceException
constructors.documentation:
Constructs a new exception with the specified error message.

 @param message the message describing the failure
